code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CommentList=()=>{const[comments,setComments]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5000/comments/demo-video").then(res=>{setComments(res.data);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Comments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:comments.map((c,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[c.timestamp,":"]})," ",c.comment," (",c.user,")"]},index))})]});};export default CommentList;
